H0.text: The circulatory system is the organ system the student used to identify the bird as a sparrow when he saw it at a feeder.

H1.text: The muscular organ system was used by the student to identify the bird as a sparrow after seeing it at a feeder.

H2.text: The nervous system is the organ system the student used to identify the bird as a sparrow when seeing it at a feeder.

H3.text: Skeletal is the organ system the student used to identify the bird as a sparrow when the student saw it at a feeder.

A4.text: All perception involves signals that go through the nervous system, which in turn result from physical or chemical stimulation of the sensory system.
